`)

* linked\_immersive\_websites (array of ObjectId, references to `websites._id`)
1. `game_engines` collection:
	* \_id (ObjectId)
	* name (string)
	* version (string)
	* website (string, URL to the game engine's website)
2. `platforms` collection:
	* \_id (ObjectId)
	* name (string)
	* website (string, URL to the platform's website)
3. `web_crawls` collection:
	* \_id (ObjectId)
	* timestamp (Date)
	* total\_websites (integer)
	* new\_websites (integer)
	* updated\_websites (integer)
	* error\_count (integer)
4. `crawl_errors` collection:
	* \_id (ObjectId)
	* website\_id (ObjectId, reference to `websites._id` or `classic_websites._id`)
	* crawl\_id (ObjectId, reference to `web_crawls._id`)
	* error\_type (string, e.g., "HTTP", "Timeout", "Parsing", etc.)
	* error\_message (string)
	* timestamp (Date)
5. `crawl_queue` collection:
	* \_id (ObjectId)
	* website\_id (ObjectId, reference to `websites._id` or `classic_websites._id`)
	* website\_type (string, either "immersive" or "classic")
	* crawl\_status (string, e.g., "pending", "crawling", "crawled")
	* assigned\_crawler\_id (string, optional, identifier of the assigned crawler)
	* timestamp (Date, time when the website was added to the queue)
